problems.description: You are given a bracket sequence consisting of '(' and ')'. You are to find whether the bracket sequence is balanced or not. A balanced bracket sequence is a string consisting of only brackets, such that this sequence, when inserted with certain numbers and mathematical operations, gives a valid mathematical expression
problems.inputs description: Input consists of a bracket sequence of '(' and ')'.
problems.expected description: true if the sequence is valid otherwise false

problems.description: You are given a list of numbers and a number K. You are required to only reverse the first K numbers of the list and return the modified list.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of an array of numbers - inp1 and the number K - inp2.
problems.expected description: Array of numbers like the input array with the first k numbers reversed.
